source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo'

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT MIN(Date_Time) AS Date_Time FROM weather_data

SELECT * from weather_data 
where Date_Time>= 
   '@{activity('GetUpdatedTime').output.firstRow.Date_Time}'
   and Date_Time > 
'@{activity('GetLastLoadTime').output.firstRow.LastLoadedTime}'
